price: Na si aboterε, na nokorε sε Onyankopɔn mma apapafoͻ no akatua nnyε kwa.
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir fa-inna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-muḥ'sinīna
